abstract.p: Abuses by international corporations, withdrawal of social services and implementation of regressive legislation continue to impoverish women and reduce the quality of their everyday lives: women have reason to be demoralized. It is intended to hearten the women's movement, and show the potential for feminist change and suggest ways to realize this potential.
